text: EliyaUvarov BP (1927) Spolia Zeylanica 14(1): 103. is a genus of grasshoppers in the subfamily Catantopinae with no tribe assigned. Species can be found in Sri Lanka.Orthoptera Species File (Version 5.0/5.0: retrieved 30 May 2021) ==Species== The Orthoptera Species File. lists: * Eliya gibbosa Henry, 1933 * Eliya pedestris Uvarov, 1927 * Eliya pictipes Uvarov, 1927 * Eliya venusta Henry, 1933 == References == == External Links == * Category:Acrididae genera Category:Catantopinae Category:Orthoptera of Asia
title: Eliya
